title: Why Existentialism Endures
description: A quick, practical guide to Why Existentialism Endures.

hook.text: Existentialism peaked in the 1950s. Yet in an age of AI and algorithms, it's more relevant than ever.

buildup.text: When technology predicts your choices, existentialism asks: are you still the one choosing?

discovery.text: Social media curates your identity. Algorithms shape your desires. Authenticity is under siege.

climax.text: The questions haven't changed: who are you, what do you stand for, and are you living honestly?

punchline.text: The world changed. The questions didn't.
